title: Live coverage | Cleveland Cavaliers Wine and Gold Scrimmage
text:
Live coverage | Cleveland Cavaliers Wine and Gold Scrimmage The Cleveland Cavaliers will hit the court Monday night at the annual Wine and Gold Scrimmage. Post to Facebook Live coverage | Cleveland Cavaliers Wine and Gold Scrimmage The Cleveland Cavaliers will hit the court Monday night at the annual Wine and Gold Scrimmage.  //on.wkyc.com/1RrwI6L   Join the Conversation To   Live coverage | Cleveland Cavaliers Wine and Gold Scrimmage WKYC Staff 7:22 p.m. EDT October 5, 2015 Cleveland Cavaliers forward LeBron James believes America needs tougher gun control penalties. (Photo: Bob Donnan-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
CLEVELAND -- The Cleveland Cavaliers will hit the court Monday night at the annual Wine and Gold Scrimmage. 
The scrimmage starts at 7 p.m. at Quicken Loans Arena. This is the first time fans will have a chance to see the Cavs in action this season. 
Our WKYC Sports Team is at the scrimmage. 
You can follow along with their coverage below, and join in the conversation by using #3Cavs. Mobile users click here .
